title: Don’t Let the Democrats Get Away With This (Ep 1232)
description:
In this episode, I address the disturbing reasons that the radical left wants to continue the destructive economic shutdowns. I also address Nancy Pelosi's troubling appearance on Fox News this weekend. Finally, I address explosive new information on the Spygate case. 

News Picks:


The latest polls explain a lot about the politics of economic shutdowns.


Devin Nunes says GOP investigators are focused on information the CIA gave to the FBI in 2016. 

The FBI withheld critical information about Christopher Steele. 


Shocking numbers of people may have already contracted the Wuhan Virus.

Coronavirus is much more widespread than people thought.


Watchdog subpoenas Google for Hillary’s emails. 


My appearance on Fox and Friends this morning.

Beware of the left’s dangerous “degrowth” movement. 


The Australians finally come clean on Downer and Spygate.
